name: BNSF Wagon Pack Add-On
detailed_description:
BNSF Wagon Pack

Formed in 1996 from two already huge Class I railroads, Burlington Northern and ATSF, BNSF is a giant of US freight transport. BNSF trains run a network of more than 32,000 track miles, moving all kinds of freight across America.
The BNSF Wagon Pack includes the following rail vehicles in BNSF livery:
BNSF Boxcar 50ft (two versions)
BNSF Flatcar green (with/without log load)
BNSF Flatcar red (with/without log load)
BNSF Hopper 100ft (two versions)
BNSF Hopper Air slide

short_description: BNSF Wagon Pack Formed in 1996 from two already huge Class I railroads, Burlington Northern and ATSF, BNSF is a giant of US freight transport. BNSF trains run a network of more than 32,000 track miles, moving all kinds of freight across America.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows® XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor:Processor: 2.8 GHz Core 2 Duo (3.2 GHz Core 2 Duo recommended), AMD Athlon MP (multiprocessor variant or comparable processors)
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:512 MB with Pixel Shader 3.0 (AGP PCIe only)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:6 GB HD space
  • Sound:Direct X 9.0c compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics:Laptop versions of these chipsets may work but are not supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required
  • Additional:Quicktime Player is required for playing the videos
